author: fabozzi
body:
These updates to NANOAOD workflows reflect the last setup after submission tests to prod infrastructure.

- removed NANOMERGE task from the workflows. The merge is handled now by computing.
- the NANOEDM task produces nano-edm files and a dataset declared as NANOAOD(SIM). This requires a change in ConfigBuilder to setup output module according to eventcontent (and cloning NANOAOD eventcontent into an identical NANOEDMAOD)
- introduced a NANOAOD workflow on data
title: Updates to NANOAOD workflows in the matrix
